description:
Russ just moved here from Kentucky. When I first met him he was so shy he wouldn't even look at me when we were talking.
I had a hell of a time even getting him to crack a smile. But some boys aren't very talkative and that's how he is.
I have to admit that Russ is a little different from the types of guys I normally shoot, but he has a very nice dick, low-hanging nuts, and a lean six pack.
title: Russ
